ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Level for Vox raid?
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually on Bristlebane you must be 45 to attend no matter what class you are. Arud Bastad 45.8 Bard on Bristlebane ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Actually on Bristlebane you must be 45 to attend no matter what class you
are.

Arud Bastad
45.8 Bard on Bristlebane
-----Original Message-----
From:
sentto-160851-24783-990168331-matosvr=theriver.com@...
[mailto:sentto-160851-24783-990168331-matosvr=theriver.com@....c
om]On Behalf Of Bill Costlow
Sent: Thursday, May 17, 2001 11:46 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Level for Vox raid?



Hi all,
I hit 42nd lvl last week and am looking for a serious raiding guild on
Rodcet Nife. I recently posted to one guild's website and got an answer
back that bards must be 45th lvl in order to be effective on a Vox raid.
Is this correct? Please let me know
Tyunes
